title: REMASTERED – Episode 28: Making a Mark
itunes:title: REMASTERED – Episode 28: Making a Mark
description:
Let’s return to the location of another classic Lore episode, for one more tour through the sandy beaches and ancient stories of the Outer Banks. Featuring fresh narration, music by Chad Lawson, and a brand new Epilogue story at the end.

Lore Resources: 

  • Episode Music: lorepodcast.com/music 
  • Episode Sources: lorepodcast.com/sources 
  • All the shows from Grim & Mild: www.grimandmild.com

©2022 Aaron Mahnke. All rights reserved.

Access premium content!: https://www.patreon.com/lorepodcast
